cast.overview: The story of Usnavi, a bodega owner who has mixed feelings about closing his store and retiring to the Dominican Republic or staying in Washington Heights.
cast.title: In the Heights

details.biography: Gregory Díaz IV was born on May 2, 2005 in New York City. the six foot three actor is of Puerto Rican descent. Gregory first showed a passion for performing at age 5. His love for acting, singing and dancing is apparent on stage and on set. He is the ultimate triple threat. Gregory made his Broadway debut in the Tony Award winning show Matilda the Musical in 2016 and toured with the company in 2017. Gregory won a NYMF Performance award for his work as leading role Pedro in the Off-Broadway production of Pedro Pan. He was also nominated for an Outstanding Ensemble award at the NYITA for his work on the Off-Broadway production of Zurich.
details.name: Gregory Díaz IV
